Package org.cougaar.core.service

This package contains the Cougaar primary core service APIs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AgentContainmentService This service allows a component to add/remove components from its agent.
AgentIdentificationService This service provides the local agent's MessageAddress.
AgentQuiescenceStateService This service allows a component to query the agents registered with the node's QuiescenceReportService and mark agents as dead (ignorable) when they have been restarted on another node.
AlarmService This service provides access to the time-based alarm services (real-time and execution-time).
AppletService This service provides access to Applet methods, and is only available if the node was launched from within a browser Applet.
AppletService.ActionHandler  
AppletService.PaintHandler  
BlackboardMetricsService This service provides primitive blackboard metrics.
BlackboardQueryService This service offers a lightweight query-only version of BlackboardService.
BlackboardService This service provides transactional publish/subscribe access to the local agent's blackboard.
BlackboardTimestampService This service tracks timestamps for the ADD (BlackboardService.publishAdd(java.lang.Object)) and the more recent modification (BlackboardService.publishChange(java.lang.Object)) of UniqueObjects.
ConditionService This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to look up sensor data on the blackboard.
ConditionService.Listener The interface to be implemented by listener objects for this service.
ConfigurationService This service provides access to the file system by searching the configuration path.
DataProtectionKey An interface used by the DataProtectionService.
DataProtectionKeyEnvelope Implementations of this interface contain a secret key used to encrypt/decrypt persisted data.
DataProtectionService This service is used by persistence to sign/encrypt an OutputStream and verify/decrypt an InputStream.
DataProtectionServiceClient Required service requestor API for DataProtectionService clients.
DemoControlService This service controls the execution time in AlarmService.currentTimeMillis() and AlarmService.addAlarm(org.cougaar.core.agent.service.alarm.Alarm).
DemoControlService.Callback An optional DemoControlService.setSocietyTime(long,double,long,Set,DemoControlService.Callback) progress monitor supplied by the service user.
DomainForBlackboardService This service is an extended DomainService for the Blackboard's use.
DomainService This service provides access to Domain object Factorys.
EventService This service is used to log assessment events.
IncarnationService This service tracks agent incarnation numbers, which are updated every time the agent restarts (excluding agent mobility).
IncarnationService.Callback Subscription callback API.
JvmStackDumpService This service requests a JVM-wide stack dump.
LoggingService This Service provides a generic logging API.
MessageProtectionService This service is used to cryptographically protect incoming and outgoing messages.
MessageStatisticsService This service provides message transport statistics, such as the total number of messages sent by the local node.
MessageTransportService This service is the node-level message transport that agents use to send and receive messages.
MessageWatcherService This service allows components to watch message send/receive activity.
NodeMetricsService This service provides simple node-level metrics.
OperatingModeService This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to find OperatingModes on the blackboard.
OperatingModeService.Listener The interface to be implemented by listeners to this service.
PersistenceControlService This service can be used to view and modify persistence settings.
PersistenceMetricsService This service provides metrics for recent persistence activity, such as the most recent snapshot size in bytes.
PersistenceMetricsService.Metric  
PlaybookConstrainService This service allows components to modify AdaptivityEngine plays and playbooks.
PlaybookReadService This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to get the list of current plays.
PlaybookReadService.Listener  
QuiescenceReportForDistributorService This service is used by the Distributor to tell the node when a local agent is quiescent or not.
QuiescenceReportService This service is used by components to tell the node the initial quiescence numbering and to toggle between quiescence and non-quiescence.
SchedulerService This service is used to schedule plugins for thread execution.
ServletService This service can be used to register a Servlet for all HTTP requests that match a specified String path.
SocketFactoryService This service is used to get a socket factory, such as an RMISocketFactory.
SuicideService This service is used to tell the agent (or node) to exit, for example due to an OutOfMemoryError.
ThreadControlService This service controls the ThreadService.
ThreadListenerService This service allows components to watch ThreadService activity.
ThreadService This service provides a Schedulables to execute a Runnable.run() method within a pooled thread.
UIDServer This service is the backwards-compatible API for the UIDService.
UIDService This service provides UIDs, which are globally unique object identifiers.
WebServicesService This service allows a component to register a WSDD (Web Services Deployment Descriptor) to receive remote Web Services XML-based calls.
 

Class Summary
BlackboardService.Delegate BlackboardService.Delegate is an instantiable convenience class which may be used by Binder writers to bind BlackboardService, either as a simple protective indirection layer, or as the base class for more complex behavior.
ConfigurationService.Delegate Delegate class for easing implementation of Binders, etc
OperatingModeService.ListenerAdapter  
 

Package org.cougaar.core.service Description

This package contains the Cougaar primary core service APIs.

The general rule is to place service APIs in "org.cougaar.core.service" if they are used by many clients (e.g. the BlackboardService) or if the implementation is defined in an external module (e.g. the MessageTransportService).

However, for legacy reasons, there are several exceptions to this rule that could be refactored, such as the commonly-used NodeControlService and restricted DomainForBlackboardService.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
